mapper.insert: insert into study_info (studyTitle, studyContent, studyWriter) values (#{studyTitle}, #{studyContent}, #{studyWriter})
mapper.select: select * from study_info where studyNo > 0 order by studyNo desc, studyWriteDate desc
mapper.update: update study_info set studyTitle = #{studyTitle}, studyContent = #{studyContent}, studyUpdateDate = now() where studyNo = #{studyNo}
update study_info set studyViewCount = studyViewCount + 1 where studyNo = #{studyNo}
mapper.insert: insert into apply_info (studyNo, applyContent, applyWriter) values (#{studyNo}, #{applyContent}, #{applyWriter})
mapper.select: select * from study_info where studyWriter = #{studyWriter} and studyNo > 0 order by studyNo desc, studyWriteDate desc

select s.studyNo, ifnull(cnt, 0) as applyCount from (select * from study_info where studyWriter = #{studyWriter}) as s left join (select studyNo, count(*) cnt from apply_info group by studyNo) as a on s.studyNo = a.studyNo order by studyWriteDate desc
select * from apply_info where studyNo = #{studyNo} order by applyDate desc
select userId, userGender from user_info as u inner join apply_info as a on a.studyNo = #{studyNo} and u.userId = a.applyWriter;
select * from apply_info where studyNo = #{studyNo} and applyWriter = #{applyWriter}
mapper.update: update apply_info set applyState = 1 where applyNo = #{applyNo}
update apply_info set applyState = 0 where applyNo = #{applyNo}
